text: Judith Marjorie "Judy" Collins (born 1 May 1939) is an American singer- songwriter. Her genres include rock and roll, pop and folk. Her well known singles include "Send In the Clowns", "Amazing Grace" and "Both Sides, Now". Collins was born in Seattle, Washington. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American guitarists Category:Singers from Seattle Category:Writers from Seattle Category:Musicians from Seattle Category:Musicians from Denver Category:Singers from Denver Category:Writers from Denver Category:1939 births Category:Living people
title: Judy Collins
